瀔字的基本解释

瀔
gǔ
〔瀔水〕水名，在中国河南省，入洛河。现作“谷水”。
〔瀔水〕地名，在中国湖南省湘乡市。

瀔字的汉语字典释义

[①]［gǔ］
［《廣韻》古禄切，入屋，見。］
古水名。即今谷水。源出河南省渑池县西南山。

Yin
Basic explanation of words
Yin
gǔ
〔Yangshui〕The name of the water, which enters the Luohe River in Henan Province, China. It is now called "Gushui".
〔瀔水〕The place name is in Xiangxiang City, Hunan Province, China.
Yin
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [gǔ]
["Guangyun" Gu Lu cut, enter the house, see you. ]
Ancient water name. That is Imaya water. Originated from the Southwest Mountain of Mianchi County, Henan Province.
